Smart Trash Can: This is a high-tech trash can that uses AI to sort recyclables from non-recyclables. It can identify different types of materials and sort them automatically, making recycling easier and more efficient. Confidence Score: 0.8

Trash Can with a Twist: This trash can has a unique design that allows it to double as a planter. The trash can is shaped like a small tree, with a built-in soil base and a removable inner container for collecting trash. When the trash is full, the user can simply remove the inner container and replace it with a new one, creating a small garden or herb garden. Confidence Score: 0.9

Self-Cleaning Trash Can: This trash can uses ultraviolet light and ozone technology to sanitize the inside of the can, keeping it clean and free of bacteria and odors. The can also has a built-in fan that circulates air to keep the inside of the can dry, preventing the growth of mold and mildew. Confidence Score: 0.9

Trash Can with a Purpose: This trash can is designed to collect and sort donations for local charities. The can has different compartments for different types of items, such as clothing, food, and household goods. When the can is full, the user can simply deposit the items in the designated drop-off location, where they will be sorted and distributed to those in need. Confidence Score: 0.8

Trash Can with a Built-in Composter: This trash can has a built-in composter that breaks down food waste and turns it into nutrient-rich compost. The composter uses a combination of heat, moisture, and oxygen to speed up the composting process, allowing the user to turn their food waste into a valuable resource. Confidence Score: 0.9
